sentences.en: A lien against the property is granted to secure an obligation.
sentences.cn: 准予对财产拥有留置权以保证义务之履行.

sentences.en: A lien is a type of security over property.
A lien may arise by operation of the law.
sentences.cn: 留置产生于法律的运作.

sentences.en: A lienee is the person in whose favour a lien exists.
sentences.cn: 留置权人是指为其利益而产生留置的人.

sentences.en: A pledge is something more that a mere lien and something less than a mortgage.
sentences.cn: 质押的性质超过纯粹留置,但却比不上按揭.

sentences.en: Afterwards, this Article discusses the content of maritime lien.
sentences.cn: 其次, 对船舶优先权的内容作一论述.

sentences.en: For the loan, he could have a lien placed on your home.
sentences.cn: 因为此笔贷款, 他对你的住房享有留置权.

sentences.en: Hello. Is this the Lien An Restaurant?
sentences.cn: 喂, 是联安餐厅 吗 ?

sentences.en: In the latest research, participants were lien mental ability tests each year.
sentences.cn: 在最新的研究中, 参与者每年接受智力测验.

sentences.en: Lien Chans recent Lian Jie, the harvest is due.
sentences.cn: 最近的连战连捷, 也是应有的收获.

sentences.en: Lien is one of Guarantee System of debt regulated by Civil Law.
sentences.cn: 留置为我国民法规定的一种债的担保方法.

sentences.en: The acquisition in good faith of lien has its composing element.
sentences.cn: 留置权的善意取得有其独立的构成要件.

sentences.en: The lienor is the person over whose goods a lien exists.
sentences.cn: 留置人是指在其财产上产生留置的人.

sentences.en: The warehouse claims a lien for all lawful charges for storage and preservation of the goods.
sentences.cn: 仓库主张对拖欠合法仓储保管费的货物享有留置权.

sentences.en: Things continue to get better since Lien s visit.
sentences.cn: 事情继续好转留置权的访问以来.

trans.tran_en: the legal right to keep something that belongs to someone who owes you money, until the debt has been paid
